description: ResourceFieldSelector represents container resources (cpu, memory) and their output format

containerName.description: Container name: required for volumes, optional for env vars

divisor.description: Specifies the output format of the exposed resources. For CPU, it can be '1m' or '1'; for memory or ephemeral-storage, it can be one of 1, 1k, 1M, 1G, 1T, 1P, 1E, 1Ki, 1Mi, 1Gi, 1Ti, 1Pi, 1Ei; for '

resource.description: Resource to select. It can be 'limits.cpu', 'requests.cpu', 'limits.memory', 'requests.memory', 'limits.ephemeral-storage', 'requests.ephemeral-storage',
